original_text: In the first month of the first year of his reign, he opened the doors of the temple of the Lord and repaired them.
korean_text: 첫째 해 첫째 달에 여호와의 전 문들을 열고 수리하고

sentences.original_text: In the first month of the first year of his reign
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 통치한 첫 해 첫 달에

sentences.original_text: he opened the doors of the temple of the Lord
